attributes.action: stop reducing state pensions because they have paid into a works pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people that pay to a works pension have their state pension reduce because they paid n.i.contributions at a smaller rate this is one &half pence in the pound and then get their state pension reduced by as much as £40 to £50 per week this means they pay £300 less in twenty years but lose £2000 in the first twelve months which is unfair
